Class GpsImpl

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.BaseObjectImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.ControllerIoImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.DeviceImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.GpsImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SonarObject, ControllerIO, Device, Gps, Storable
public class GpsImpl extends DeviceImpl implements Gps
Implements a GPS (Global Positioning System) device.
Author:
John L. Stanley - SRF Consulting, Douglas Lau
